subject: There are no published reports of any side effects after use of Anatrim. With Anatrim you can't lose.
body:
Each Anatrim capsule contains 200mg pure Anatrim Zombieii refined powder. If you frequently crave a midnight snack, an additional capsule in the evening might help to curb those late-night cravings. Watch the pounds melt away and the new you emerge!
http://daverni.net
Obesity more than doubles one's chances of developing high blood pressure, which affects approximately 26 percent of obese American men and women.
